title: Liaison Link
summary: Enterprise healthcare platform serving 10,000+ NHS users. High-availability architecture with secure data flows, OAuth2/JWT authentication, and real-time capabilities.

title: SendSprint
summary: Cross-border payment and money transfer application. Built with resilient architecture, secure transaction handling, and optimized performance for financial operations.

title: ConnecMe2
summary: Social connectivity platform with real-time messaging, user presence, and scalable backend integration. Focus on performance and user experience.

title: Jarvis Lifetime Pension
summary: Financial planning and pension management application. Secure architecture with GDPR compliance, encrypted storage, and intuitive user flows.

title: Specnota
summary: Modern web platform for streamlined workflows and collaboration. Built with React, TypeScript, and scalable architecture for optimal performance.

title: Design System Toolkit
summary: Modular, accessible component library and token pipeline accelerating UI iteration across products.

title: Realtime Collaboration Suite
summary: OT + CRDT editor enabling presence, comments, offline sync, and conflict resolution.

title: Performance Insights Dashboard
summary: Dashboards aggregating core web vitals, error traces, and release metrics for engineering teams.
